Text: ah before i forget they are the original dlc\'s nothing modded

Hi mate,

I fucked up at installation, i accidentally installed all the DLC's before updating, i didn't know about that. I updated after installing the DLC's. I also didn't install Overlord because of the bug noted in the Instructions. Everything seems to be working fine, but it is advised to follow the instructions.

Install the Update, then
Install all the DLC's

It worked out for me, luckily!

This torrent is a must download!

Ok, fixed the issue, just open the folder with all the .00x files with winRAR, and the double click one of those. They actually are .r0x files I guess. If you do this, you can simply extract the files and run the update. Then copy the crack to your game folder. 

Regards, 
Nycrea

Any help would be appreciated. 

Regards,

@nycrea yea is like u figure it out extract the files from the update folder with winrar (is the original scene release by ViTALiTY) as for the dlc the same they retail. as how to activate the dlc just use the dlcunlocker and there will be no problems, all teh dlc will be activated just remember to enter the game first after you have installed it and disable cerberus network in the game
